        The
        Intercept_

        American ISIS

        Listen on Audible

        The remarkable story of Russell Dennison, an American ex-convict and Muslim convert who joined the Islamic State in Syria. As U.S. and coalition airstrikes rained down on ISIS fighters in 2018 and 2019, Dennison secretly recorded dozens of hours of audio about his past and his life with ISIS and sent them to journalist Trevor Aaronson with one condition: Nothing he said could be revealed until he was captured or — more likely — killed. American ISIS is an Audible Original. Produced by The Intercept, Topic Studios, and Western Sound.

        Listen to every episode of American ISIS exclusively on Audible.
